:• '''1300''' Mbps - 3SS 5GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ac#Data_rates_and_speed 802.11ac] (80MHz chan.), :• '''300''' Mbps - 2SS 2.4GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11n-2009#Data_rates 802.11n] (40MHz chan.) = '''''1600 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|SURFboard DOCSIS 3.0 Cable Modem & Wi-Fi Router}} :{{ProductPage|http://www.arris.com/surfboard/products/wi-fi-cable-modems/sbg6700-ac/}}{{SupportPage|vendor=Arris|p=a0ha000000NJohzAAD}} {{•}} [https://www.cox.com/content/dam/cox/residential/support/internet/print_media/ARRIS_SURFboard_SBG6700_Data_Sheet.pdf Datasheet] (Cox) *DOCSIS 3.0 8x4{{CableModemSpec |down_c=8 |up_c=4 }} "ARRIS", "592440-001 REV.7", and "14-AUG-2013" is silkscreened :on the mainboard in the FCC photos. The 5GHz FEMs may be RFFM4591F (they're marked ''FMF, 4591, STPH''). *[https://fccid.io/pdf.php?id=2227173 FCC SBG6700-AC Base Unit BOM] :BASE UNIT,DOCSIS 3.0,SBG6700-AC,802.11AC/2-ENET; PEGATRON, DG00DAX6482AC :ASSY,MB,MN, SBG6700-AC, BCM3383G; PCB,MB,MN, SBG6700AC, BCM33843D; :MOD,RF,WLAN,802.11N,2X2,SINGLE BAND,2.4GHZ,PCIE HALF-MINI, BCM943217, P255 :MOD,RF,WLAN,802.11AC,3X3,SINGLE BAND,5GHZ,PCIE FULL-MINI, BCM94360MCH5, P404 *[http://www.dslreports.com/hardware/ARRIS-SBG6700-AC-h4027 ''Arris SBG6700-AC'' on '''DSLReports'''] {{See also|Arris SBG6400|Arris}}
